commands.name: !safe-from-being-cancelled
commands.description: Confirms that reparations have been accepted and all has been ammended.

commands.name: !points
commands.description: Prints out the user's total number of points.

commands.name: !daily-points
commands.description: Gives the user their daily allowance of points if they haven't already claimed them.

commands.name: !add-points
commands.description: Adds points to a specified user's account.

commands.name: !rank
commands.description: Display a user's rank class which is determined by ranges of points.

commands.name: !rank-all
commands.description: Displays all of the user's in order of most points to least.

commands.name: !gift
commands.description: Give another player some of your own points.
